Install
==========

To install ``feFlow``, you must have FEniCS Legacy installed. There are multiple methods one can install FEniCS Legacy. 

First you can follow the instructions outlined on FEniCS website: https://fenicsproject.org/download/archive/

feFlow also provide a FEniCS Legacy build from source script. Follow the instructions outlined in ``extern/FEniCS/README.md``

Once FEniCS is installed, navigate to the main directory of ``feFlow`` and run

.. code:: bash

   python3 -m pip install -e .
